diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Art Criticism.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    ArtCriticism[Art Criticism] --> Field1[Art]
    ArtCriticism --> Field2[Philosophy]
    ArtCriticism --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    art --> artSub1[Theory]
    art --> artSub2[Practice]
    philosophy --> philosophySub1[Theory]
    philosophy --> philosophySub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
